string-array.name: drawer_array
string-array.item: Search will allow you to search for specific events
Event Map will place each event shown onto a map
My Events will show events stored by you
About will tell you more about our App

string-array.name: tutorial_array
string-array.item: On the this screen, you will see the results of a search
In order to customise your searched, you will be brought to the preferences section

string-array.name: event_tutorial_array
string-array.item: This is the Detailed Event Screen
Save Event will add the event to your My Event page, for easy access
Map Event will show you the location of the event on a map
The share icon on the action bar will share the event in a variety of ways
The play icon on the action bar will play a sample of the artist\'s music in your default music player
The calendar icon on the action bar will add the event to your default Calendar application
